00033 class mmap_file : public ufs_file_base
00034 {
00035 public:
00040     inline mmap_file (const std::string & filename, int mode, int disk = -1) :
00041         ufs_file_base (filename, mode, disk)
00042     { }
00043     request_ptr aread(
00044         void * buffer,
00045         stxxl::int64 pos,
00046         size_t bytes,
00047         completion_handler on_cmpl);
00048     request_ptr awrite(
00049         void * buffer,
00050         stxxl::int64 pos,
00051         size_t bytes,
00052         completion_handler on_cmpl);
00053 };
00054 
00056 class mmap_request : public ufs_request_base
00057 {
00058     friend class mmap_file;
00059 protected:
00060     inline mmap_request (mmap_file * f,
00061                          void * buf, stxxl::int64 off, size_t b,
00062                          request_type t,
00063                          completion_handler on_cmpl) :
00064         ufs_request_base (f, buf, off, b, t, on_cmpl)
00065     { }
00066     void serve();
00067 
00068 public:
00069     inline const char * io_type()
00070     {
00071         return "mmap";
00072     }
00073 private:
00074     // Following methods are declared but not implemented
00075     // intentionnaly to forbid their usage
00076     mmap_request(const mmap_request &);
00077     mmap_request & operator=(const mmap_request &);
00078     mmap_request();
00079 };
